news.title: Famine 'currently playing out' in Gaza, UN-backed experts warn
news.summary: It comes as aid agencies warn Israel's recent measures to increase aid supplies are not enough.

news.title: Women abused as children by Rotherham gangs say police also sexually assaulted them
news.summary: One says she was raped from the age of 12 by a South Yorkshire Police officer in a marked police car.

news.title: Watch: Sarina Wiegman dances for joy as Lionesses celebrate Euros win
news.summary: The Lionesses celebrate after returning from Switzerland with the Euro 2025 trophy following their victory over Spain in the final on Sunday.

news.title: Trump's Scotland trip gives him three things he likes - and one thing he doesn't
news.summary: As Trump wraps up his working holiday in the UK, the BBC's North America editor Sarah Smith assesses its success.

news.title: Theft of royal items prompts £3m insurance payout
news.summary: The annual finances of the Royal Collection Trust show the scale of the theft of royal items on loan to a Paris museum.

news.title: New York gunman was targeting NFL but went to wrong office, mayor says
news.summary: Four people were killed when a gunman stormed a skyscraper on Monday evening and opened fire.

news.title: Police seek to question Tommy Robinson in connection with station assault
news.summary: Transport police are investigating an incident at the London station it says left a man with serious injuries.

news.title: Dali painting bought for £150 could fetch £30k
news.summary: The Salvador Dali painting will be auctioned off after having been snapped up at a house clearance.

news.title: Bereaved parents ‘horrified' by Leeds maternity services report
news.summary: NHS England finds "significant'' concerns about services at Leeds Teaching Hospitals NHS Trust.

news.title: Man arrested after two killed in quadruple stabbing in south London
news.summary: A man, aged 31, is arrested following the stabbing deaths of two people in south-east London.
